description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Ouzbékistan (l'), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Ouzbékistan (l') ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Uzbekistan through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Uzbekistan, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

Staff position (national) to support programme management, coordination and effective implementation of the Programme
Staff position (national) to support programme management, coordination and effective implementation of the Programme

title.narrative: Framework for health financing strategy developed based on analytical work.

target.value: Strategic multi-year engagement on health financing reforms which will include: (i) Public expenditures review (PER) in health with looking at regional disparities in provision of care; (ii) Analysis of allocative efficiency of Uzbekistan health system to propose options for improvement; (iii) Evaluation of vertically financed health programs and review flow of finances to explore any additional resource mobilization for health; (iv) Discuss with the Government the fiscal space, its risks and opportunities for health insurance introduction and universal health coverage; (v) technical assistance to the government on development of a health financing strategy and facilitate the process for making right decisions on the UHC benefit package and the move to strategic purchasing. In the first year, the team will focus on analytics, including the public expenditure review and the allocative efficiency analysis.

Strategic multi-year engagement on health financing reforms which will include: (i) Public expenditures review (PER) in health with looking at regional disparities in provision of care; (ii) Analysis of allocative efficiency of Uzbekistan health system to propose options for improvement; (iii) Evaluation of vertically financed health programs and review flow of finances to explore any additional resource mobilization for health; (iv) Discuss with the Government the fiscal space, its risks and opportunities for health insurance introduction and universal health coverage; (v) technical assistance to the government on development of a health financing strategy and facilitate the process for making right decisions on the UHC benefit package and the move to strategic purchasing. In the first year, the team will focus on analytics, including the public expenditure review and the allocative efficiency analysis.
